seoMetaDescription.default: Read Clensy's terms of service. Understand the terms and conditions for using our professional cleaning services.

ogDescription.default: Terms and conditions for using Clensy cleaning services.

heroDescription.default: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services

agreementDescription.default: By booking any service with Clensy LLC ('Clensy Cleaning'), either through our website, over the phone, or by email/text, you agree to comply with these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, do not proceed with booking a service.

default.title: 1. Service Agreement
default.content: By booking a cleaning service with Clensy, you agree to these terms and conditions. Our services are provided on an as-is basis, and we reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason.

default.title: 2. Booking and Cancellation
default.content:
• Bookings can be made online, by phone, or email
• Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before the scheduled service
• Late cancellations (less than 24 hours) may incur a cancellation fee of up to 50% of the service cost
• No-shows will be charged the full service amount

default.title: 3. Payment Terms
default.content:
• Payment is due upon completion of service unless otherwise arranged
• We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and electronic payments
• Recurring service customers may set up automatic billing
• Prices are subject to change with 30 days notice for recurring customers

default.title: 4. Service Guarantee
default.content: We stand behind our work with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with our cleaning, contact us within 24 hours and we'll return to re-clean the areas of concern at no additional charge.

default.title: 5. Access and Security
default.content:
• You must provide safe and reasonable access to your property
• If providing keys or access codes, you authorize our team to enter your property
• We maintain strict security protocols for all access information
• Pets should be secured during cleaning for safety

default.title: 6. Liability and Insurance
default.content:
• Clensy is fully insured and bonded
• We are not liable for damage to items not properly secured or fragile items not disclosed
• Claims for damage must be reported within 24 hours of service
• Our liability is limited to the cost of repair or replacement, not exceeding the service cost

default.title: 7. Customer Responsibilities
default.content:
• Ensure a safe working environment for our team
• Disclose any hazardous materials or conditions
• Secure valuables and fragile items
• Provide accurate information about your property

default.title: 8. Privacy
default.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

default.title: 9. Changes to Terms
default.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to our website. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified terms.
